== Requirements： ==

 JDK：1.5+

 JDK: 1.4+ (Recompling the code yourself when required. The RCP and annotation will be invalid.)

 Servlet 2.4 is required when running under Web Container.

 Guzz depends on dom4J and commons-log which can be found under the download page.

== How to create a guzz project? ==
 
 We suggest that you download the empty project of Guzz, and import it into Eclipse/MyEclipse to have the start.
